title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Introduction to Programming: Robot Simulation Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer usage skills and logical thinking abilities
context.additional_context: Conducts hands-on education using LEGO Mindstorms robot simulation tools in a VR environment. Provides a simplified programming environment to prevent learners from being hindered by complex interface elements.

learning_goals: Implement three or more robot control programs utilizing conditional statements and loop concepts in a simplified VR environment.
Design problem-solving algorithms by combining ten basic commands provided by the simulation tool.
Achieve a score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in a self-efficacy survey after programming learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
